topic.title: Windows Service Reports 'Incorrect Function When Started'

keywords.indexterm: Installing OxygenTCP floating license serverWindows 32-bitIncorrect Function error

body.p: The "Incorrect Function" error message when starting the Windows service usually appears because the Windows service launcher cannot locate a Java virtual machine on your system.
Make sure that you have installed a 32-bit Java SE from Oracle (or Sun) on the system: .
